lines.text:
[ending his affair with Erica]
I've always been good at letting go.

[blocking the door]
You should be ashamed of yourself, Brian. Seducing one of your own students! Poor Wendy's utterly devastated and she does *not* want to see you.
Let me talk to her, Danielle. Damn it!
[looks past her to Wendy, who is slumped on the sofa in a bed gown, obviously distressed]

[Triumphant]
You see what you've done to her? It's time men learned that women are not just playthings. Wendy is *not* going to sleep with you again, Brian. Wendy has joined the revolution!
